name: RoBuds
description:
RoBuds is a 3D stealth puzzle game created for the Design Buddies Game Jam 2020!

The RoBuds were living peacefully on their ship when they got attacked by evil eggbots. During the invasion, three RoBuds were separated from their crewmates. Through the power of teamwork and friendship, the three buddies must work together using their unique abilities to navigate through the ship, avoid the enemy eggbots, and reunite with their fellow RoBuds!

Controls:
Arrow keys - Move
Spacebar - Special ability
Tab - Switch characters
Escape - Pause game

Team:
Leilani Tashima - Project Management & UX/UI Design
Audie Mendaros - Programming
Miah Dawes - UX Design & Programming
Jiayi Zheng - UX/UI Design & Illustration
Karthick Gunasekaran - 3D Art
